p: Based on the above-mentioned data, the current study was performed to optimise the cytotoxic potential, study the structure-activity relationship (SAR), and investigate the mechanism of action of the pyrrolizine-5-carboxamide 10. In this study, scaffold A ( Figure 3) was designed bearing the pharmacophoric groups of the lead compound 10 and the multi-CDKIs 3 17.
